item.description:
The Bernadette's are back at Stonebridge in Milford.

Along with Rowley's closing this month, so has Daniel Street, the sister venue of the Stonebridge...the folks at Stonebridge will now be concentrating on featuring live music across the street at their original Stonebridge venue.  Long time friends and fans of The Bernadettes may remember many of our fun shows at the Stonebridge in the years past!  We're really looking forward to performing again at Stonebridge...lotsa fun memories, jam packed dance floors and standing room only crowds...let's do that all over again!!!  Putting the word out to all of our friends to head on out to the Stonebridge this Saturday night and let's throw a party like we did in the 'ol days...showtime at 10:00...bring your dancing shoes too!!!  And while you're at it, bring your appetite with you also, cuz the Stonebridge has a well deserved reputation as one of the finest restaurants in Milford.  C'mon out to the Stonebridge this Saturday night...we wanna see your face in the place!!!  For more info on the Stonebridge, visit their website at: http://www.stonebridgerestaurant.com/

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: The Bernadette's back at Stonebridge
